prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek body and white feathers for a coastal environment.
Imagine a cheerful bird Pokemon that glides gracefully over the ocean waves.
Give me a design for a small, friendly Pokemon that loves to play near the shore.
Show me a flying Pokemon that has blue stripes and a white body, perfect for beach adventures.
Generate a cute, winged creature that can be found nesting on cliffs by the sea.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the ocean, with vibrant colors and a playful demeanor.
Design a water and flying-type Pokemon that uses its wings to soar above tropical landscapes.
